synopsis.text: Tokyo University of the Arts' Graduate School of Film and New Media presents "Will Hatching Day Come?", a heartwarming tale of a young girl's unwavering belief in the power of nurturing warmth. Directed by Chayanit Kiatchokechaikul, this 2015 animated short follows the girl's journey as she attempts to hatch a baby chicken from an egg she keeps in her fridge. With music by Soyoka Hayashi, sound design by Manami Noda, and produced by Mitsuko Okamoto, this anime is a testament to the magic of faith and the anticipation of new life. Will the girl's persistence pay off, or will her dreams remain unhatched? Join her in this touching exploration of hope and determination.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
